# Files and folders

This includes a list of the files and folders with a once sentence purpose discription to help a contributor navigate files.

+ README.qmd - This is the primary landing file for the directory, you are here!
+ _CurationTemplate - This folder contains a template for new projects
  + ProjectYYYY.qmd - The primary organizing document for new projects including the status of each proposed data source and whom to contact as project lead.
  + ProjectYYYY.bib - A bib file primarily containing references to data sources but could also contain background citations.
